name: praSANGKA
description:
praSANGKA is a social impact text serial adventure game, where you play a prejudiced landlord trying to maintain your racist criteria while interviewing potential tenants who do not conform to your bigoted stereotypes. You choose from a selection of responses to try to re-establish confirmation bias. This pilot game has 3 possible endings.

praSANGKA is a playable game prototype written & developed by JEMGENG during the inaugural Games Bagus Workshop & Game Jam 2022.


Aisyah Ambok • Production Manager  - Editor
